001package com.avaje.ebean.cache;
002
003/**
004 * The statistics collected per cache.
005 * <p>
006 * These can be monitored to review the effectiveness of a particular cache.
007 * </p>
008 * 
009 * @author rbygrave
010 * 
011 */
012public class ServerCacheStatistics {
013
014  protected String cacheName;
015
016  protected int maxSize;
017
018  protected int size;
019
020  protected int hitCount;
021
022  protected int missCount;
023
024  public String toString() {
025    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
026    sb.append(cacheName);
027    sb.append(" size:").append(size);
028    sb.append(" hitRatio:").append(getHitRatio());
029    sb.append(" hitCount:").append(hitCount);
030    sb.append(" missCount:").append(missCount);
031    sb.append(" maxSize:").append(maxSize);
032    return sb.toString();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Return the name of the cache.
037   */
038  public String getCacheName() {
039    return cacheName;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Set the name of the cache.
044   */
045  public void setCacheName(String cacheName) {
046    this.cacheName = cacheName;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Return the hit count. The number of successful gets.
051   */
052  public int getHitCount() {
053    return hitCount;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Set the hit count.
058   */
059  public void setHitCount(int hitCount) {
060    this.hitCount = hitCount;
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Return the miss count. The number of gets that returned null.
065   */
066  public int getMissCount() {
067    return missCount;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Set the miss count.
072   */
073  public void setMissCount(int missCount) {
074    this.missCount = missCount;
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Return the size of the cache.
079   */
080  public int getSize() {
081    return size;
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Set the size of the cache.
086   */
087  public void setSize(int size) {
088    this.size = size;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Return the maximum size of the cache.
093   * <p>
094   * Can be used in conjunction with the size to determine if the cache use is
095   * being potentially limited by its maximum size.
096   * </p>
097   */
098  public int getMaxSize() {
099    return maxSize;
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Set the maximum size of the cache.
104   */
105  public void setMaxSize(int maxSize) {
106    this.maxSize = maxSize;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Returns an int from 0 to 100 (percentage) for the hit ratio.
111   * <p>
112   * A hit ratio of 100 means every get request against the cache hits an entry.
113   * </p>
114   */
115  public int getHitRatio() {
116    int totalCount = hitCount + missCount;
117    if (totalCount == 0) {
118      return 0;
119    } else {
120      return hitCount * 100 / totalCount;
121    }
122  }
123
124}
